title: London's country
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey, Ian Ferguson, Harold Lowenstein and Syd Sharples
brief_description: Presents a world of wildlife and flowers and scenic beauty - where people can enjoy yachting on the Thames, or archery at Sevenoaks; riding at Knole Park, or morris-dancing at Westerham; walking over the hills near Newlands Corner, or cricket on the green at Cookham; where they can admire historic buildings - Windsor Castle, Canterbury Cathedral, Farnham Keep, the Dickens houses at Rochester, the Roman ruins at Verulamium.
